message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $12,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? This price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,800?
